Name: Confirm-SecureBootUEFI
Synopsis: Confirms that Secure Boot is enabled by checking the Secure Boot status on the local computer.

Name: Format-SecureBootUEFI
Synopsis: Formats certificates or hashes into a content object that is returned and creates a file that is ready to be signed.

Name: Get-SecureBootPolicy
Synopsis: Gets the publisher GUID and the policy version of the Secure Boot configuration policy.

Name: Get-SecureBootUEFI
Synopsis: Gets the UEFI variable values related to Secure Boot.

Name: Set-SecureBootUEFI
Synopsis: Sets the Secure Boot-related UEFI variables.
